channel.title: Winterlove Player Updating & Saving?
channel.description: Ok so I'm starting my first winterlove source from scratch and I got no-thread-per-client and w/e. My problem is that my character saves in a .dat and when i change my characters appearance it doesn't update I added things such as "appearanceUpdateRequired = true;" & "updateRequired = true;" and it still isn't updating this is really driving me nuts.

item.title: Winterlove Player Updating & Saving?
item.dc:creator: @wavemaker wavemaker
item.description:
@wavemaker wrote:

Ok so I’m starting my first winterlove source from scratch and I got no-thread-per-client and w/e. My problem is that my character saves in a .dat and when i change my characters appearance it doesn’t update I added things such as “appearanceUpdateRequired = true;” & “updateRequired = true;” and it still isn’t updating this is really driving me nuts.

Read full topic
